title: Video: Formation – Young Ones
body:
Having only recently made their live debut, London duo **Formation** are streaming a new track lifted from an EP expected early next year.

Still keeping information to a bare minimum, the South London twins truly let the music do the talking on _Young Ones_, also stepping away from the visuals that characterised their first release. This is how David Byrne fronting LCD Soundsystem might sound; confident, funky and deliriously over the top; it’s further indication that Formation are on to something rather special.
